languages.text: {n}Сенешаль остается глух к вашим словам, предпочитая беседу с фантомами.{/n}
{n}Your words fall on deaf ears: the old man's attention remains focused on his conversation with a phantom.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Сенешаль остается глух к вашим словам, предпочитая беседу с фантомами.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Your words fall on deaf ears — the old man's attention remains focused on his conversation with a phantom.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}あなたの言葉は彼の耳には届いていない。老人は幻影との会話に夢中になっているのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your words fall on deaf ears: the old man's attention remains focused on his conversation with a phantom.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの言葉は彼の耳には届いていない。老人は幻影との会話に夢中になっているのだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德对你的话置若罔闻，他全部的注意力依然放在幽灵身上。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your words fall on deaf ears: the old man's attention remains focused on his conversation with a phantom.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德对你的话置若罔闻，他全部的注意力依然放在幽灵身上。{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Tus palabras le entran por un oído y le salen por el otro. La atención del anciano sigue centrada en su conversación con un fantasma.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your words fall on deaf ears: the old man's attention remains focused on his conversation with a phantom.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tus palabras le entran por un oído y le salen por el otro. La atención del anciano sigue centrada en su conversación con un fantasma.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Deine Worte fallen auf taube Ohren: Die Aufmerksamkeit des alten Mannes bleibt auf sein Gespräch mit einem Phantom konzentriert.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your words fall on deaf ears: the old man's attention remains focused on his conversation with a phantom.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Deine Worte fallen auf taube Ohren: Die Aufmerksamkeit des alten Mannes bleibt auf sein Gespräch mit einem Phantom konzentriert.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Vos paroles n'ont absolument aucun effet : l'attention du vieil homme reste concentrée sur sa conversation avec un fantôme.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your words fall on deaf ears: the old man's attention remains focused on his conversation with a phantom.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vos paroles n'ont absolument aucun effet : l'attention du vieil homme reste concentrée sur sa conversation avec un fantôme.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Dediklerin, Abelard'ın bir kulağından girip ötekinden çıkıyor. İhtiyar, tüm dikkatini bir hayaletle arasındaki sohbete vermiş durumda.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your words fall on deaf ears: the old man's attention remains focused on his conversation with a phantom.{/n}
